text: Nufenen (, ) was a municipality of the district of Hinterrhein in the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. It is on the San Bernardino tunnel road. On 1 January 2019, the former municipalities of Hinterrhein, Nufenen and Splügen merged to form the new municipality of Rheinwald. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Nufenen
